Package com.github.kaktushose.jda.commands.data

Interface Repository<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type the repository manages
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GuildSettingsJsonRepository, JsonRepository
    public interface Repository<T>
    Generic top level interface for performing CRUD operations on different persistence structures. Always uses long for the id.
    Since:
    2.0.0
    Version:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Kaktushose

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      long count()
      Returns the entity count.
      void delete​(long id)
      Delete an entity by id.
      void deleteAll​(Collection<Long> ids)
      Delete all given entities by id
      boolean existsById​(long id)
      Returns whether an entity with the given id exists.
      Collection<T> findAll()
      Returns all entities inside the repository.
      Optional<T> findById​(long id)
      Retrieves an entity by id.
      void save​(long id, T entity)
      Saves a given entity.
      void saveAll​(@NotNull Map<@Nullable Long,​@Nullable T> entities)
      Saves all given entities.
